alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 4:14AM EST until February 24 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to locally 10 inches, greatest over higher terrain from Copper Harbor to Mohawk. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause near whiteouts at times in snow and blowing snow, especially for exposed areas along Lake Superior. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM Thursday to midnight EST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
